utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Guys? There's a somebody I'd like you to meet.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oooh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: W-wait. What is that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 'That' would be Marcel. You wanna say hi?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, no, I don't.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, he is precious! Where did you get him?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My friend Bethel rescued him from some lab.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That is so cruel! Why? Why would a parent name their child Bethel?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, that monkey's got a Ross on its ass!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross, is he gonna live with you, like, in your apartment?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. I mean, it's been kinda quiet since Carol left, so...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don't you just get a roommate?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nah, I dunno... I think you reach a certain age, having a roommate is kinda pathe- ....sorry, that's, that's 'pathet', which is Sanskrit for 'really cool way to live'.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So you guys, I'm doing all new material tonight. I have twelve new songs about my mother's suicide, and one about a snowman.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Might wanna open with the snowman.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey, Joey. Hey, buddy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, how'd it go?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ahhhhhh, I didn't get the job.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How could you not get it? You were Santa last year.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I dunno. Some fat guy's sleeping with the store manager. He's not even jolly, it's all political.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So what are you gonna be?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah, I'm gonna be one of his helpers. It's just such a slap in the face, y'know?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, do you guys know what you're doing for New Year's? Gee, what?! What is wrong with New Year's?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nothing for you, you have Paolo. You don't have to face the horrible pressures of this holiday: desperate scramble to find anything with lips just so you can have someone to kiss when the ball drops!! Man, I'm talking loud!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, for your information, Paolo is gonna be in Rome this New Year, so I'll be just as pathetic as the rest of you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you wish!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's just that I'm sick of being a victim of this Dick Clark holiday. I say this year, no dates, we make a pact. Just the six of us- dinner.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yeah, okay. Alright.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, I was hoping for a little more enthusiasm.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Woooo! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, you're on.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, oh, good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, hi. Ladies and gentlemen, back by popular demand, Miss Phoebe Buffay. Wooh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thanks, hi. Um, I wanna start with a song that means a lot to me this time of year.

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: No. No, that's- that's okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, c'mon, if it's important enough to discuss while I'm playing, then I assume it's important enough for everyone else to hear!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That guy's going home with a note!

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Noth- I was- I was just saying to my-

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Could you speak up please?

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Sorry, I wa- I was just saying to my friend that I thought you were the most beautiful woman that I'd ever seen in my- in my life. And then he said that- you said you thought

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: Daryl Hannah.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Daryl Hannah was the most beautiful woman that he'd ever seen in his life and I said yeah, I liked her in Splash, a lot, but not so much in- in Wall Street, I thought she had kind of a

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: Hard quality.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: -hard quality. And uh, while Daryl Hannah is beautiful in a conventional way, you are luminous with a kind of a delicate grace. Then, uh, that-that-that's when you started yelling.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, we're gonna take a short break.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, that guy's going home with more than a note!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come here, Marcel. Sit here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pheebs, I can't believe he hasn't kissed you yet. I mean God, by my sixth date with Paolo, I mean he had already named both my breasts! ...Ooh. Did I just share too much?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Just a smidge.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: David's like, y'know, Scientist Guy. He's very methodical.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think it's romantic.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Me too! Oh! Did you ever see An Officer and a Gentleman?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, he's kinda like the guy I went to see that with. Except, except he-he's smarter, and gentler, and sweeter... I just- I just wanna be with him all the time. Day and night, and night and day... and special occasions...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait a minute, wait a minute, I see where this is going, you're gonna ask him to New Year's, aren't you. You're gonna break the pact. She's gonna break the pact.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, no, no, no, no, no. Yeah, could I just?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, 'cause I already asked Janice.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: C'mon, this was a pact! This was your pact!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I snapped, okay? I couldn't handle the pressure and I snapped.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, but Janice? That-that was like the worst breakup in history!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm not saying it was a good idea, I'm saying I snapped!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi. Hi, sorry I'm late.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Too many jokes... must mock Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nice shoes, huh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aah, y'killing me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross! He's playing with my spatulas again!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, look, he's not gonna hurt them, right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you always have to bring him here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I didn't wanna leave him alone. Alright? We- we had our first fight this morning. I think it has to do with my working late. I said some things that I didn't mean, and he- he threw some faeces...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, if you're gonna work late, I could look in on him for you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, that'd be great! Okay, but if you do, make sure it seems like you're there to see him, okay, and you're not like doing it as a favour to me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, but if he asks, I'm not going to lie.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: ...But, you can't actually test this theory, because today's particle accelerators are nowhere near powerful enough to simulate these conditions.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, alright, I have a question, then.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Yuh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Um, were you planning on kissing me ever?

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Uh, that's definitely a, uh, valid question. And, uh, the answer would be yes. Yes I was. But, see, I wanted it to be this phenomenal kiss that happened at this phenomenal moment, because, well, 'cause it's you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Right. But, see, the longer I waited, the more phenomenal the kiss had to be, and now we've reached a place where it's just gotta be one of those things where I just like... sweep everything off the table and throw you down on it. And, uh, I'm not really a, uh, sweeping sorta fella.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, David, I, I think you are a sweeping sorta fella. I mean, you're a sweeper! ...trapped inside a physicist's body.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Rrrreally.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, oh, I'm sure of it. You should just do it, just sweep and throw me.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: ...Now? Now?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah, right now.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Okay, okay, okay. Y'know what, this was just really expensive. And I'll take- this was a gift.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, now you're just kinda tidying.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Okay, what the hell, what the hell. You want me to actually throw you or you-you wanna just hop?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can hop.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So tell me something. What does the phrase 'no date pact' mean to you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm sorry, okay. It's just that Chandler has somebody, and Phoebe has somebody- I thought I'd ask Fun Bobby.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fun Bobby? Your ex-boyfriend Fun Bobby?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You know more than one Fun Bobby?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I happen to know a Fun Bob.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, here we go...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh ooh ooh ooh, there's no room for milk!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: There. Now there is.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, so on our no-date evening, three of you now have dates.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, four.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Four.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Five.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Five.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sorry. Paolo's catching an earlier flight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, and I met this really hot single mom at the store. What's an elf to do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, so I'm gonna be the only one standing there alone when the ball drops?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, c'mon. We'll have, we'll have a big party, and no-one'll know who's with who.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, y'know, this is so not what I needed right now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's the matter?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, it's-it's Marcel. He keeps shutting me out, y'know? He's walking around all the time dragging his hands...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's so weird, I had such a blast with him the other night.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, we played, we watched TV.. that juggling thing is amazing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What, uh... what juggling thing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: With the balled-up socks? I figured you taught him that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, it wasn't that big a deal. He just balled up socks... and a melon...

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: Phoebe. Hi.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, hi Max! Hey, do you know everybody?

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: No. Have you seen David?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, no, he hasn't been around.

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: Well, if you see him, tell him to pack his bags. We are going to Minsk.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Minsk?

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: Minsk. It's in Russia.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know where Minsk is.

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: We got the grant. Three years, all expenses paid.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So when, when do you leave?

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: January first.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Hi! What-what're you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Um, well, Max told me about Minsk, so congratulations! This is so exciting!

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: It'd be even more exciting if we were going.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, you're not going? Oh, why?

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: Tell her, David. 'I don't wanna go to Minsk and work with Lifson and Yamaguchi and Flench, on nonononononono. I wanna stay here and make out with my girlfriend!!'

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Thank you, Max. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So-so you're really not going?

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: I don't know. I don't know what I'm gonna do. I just- you decide.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh don't do that.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Please.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no no.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: No, but I'm asking-

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, but I can't do that-

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: No, but I can't-

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's your thing, and-

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: -make the decision-

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, um, stay.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Stay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Stay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Getting so good at that!

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: It was Max's stuff.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I love this artichoke thing! Oh, don't tell me what's in it, the diet starts tomorrow!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You remember Janice.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Vividly.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Sandy
utterance.content: Hi, I'm Sandy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sandy! Hi! C'mon in! ...You brought your kids.

utterance.speaker: Sandy
utterance.content: Yeah. That's okay, right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Par-tay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That thing is not coming in here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 'That thing'? This is how you greet guests at a party? Let me ask you something, if I showed up here with my new girlfriend, she wouldn't be welcome in your home?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm guessing your new girlfriend wouldn't urinate on my coffee table.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. He was more embarrassed about that than anyone. Okay? And for him to have the courage to walk back in here like nothing happened...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright. Just keep him away from me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you. C'mon, Marcel, whaddya say you and I do a little mingling? Alright, I'll, uh... catch up with you later.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my gosh! Rachel, honey.. are you okay? Where-where's Paolo?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Rome. Jerk missed his flight.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And then... your face is bloated?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. Okay. I was at the airport, getting into a cab, when this woman- this blonde planet with a pocketbook- starts yelling at me. Something about how it was her cab first. And then the next thing I know she just starts- starts pulling me out by my hair! So I'm blowing my attack whistle thingy and three more cabs show up, and as I'm going to get into a cab she tackles me. And I hit my head on the kerb and cut my lip on my whistle...oh...everybody having fun at the party? Are people eating my dip?

utterance.speaker: Sandy
utterance.content: Y'know, when I saw you at the store last week, it was probably the first time I ever mentally undressed an elf.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow, that's, uh, dirty.

utterance.speaker: Sandy
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, kids...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look at him. I'm not saying he has to spend the whole evening with me, but at least check in.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: There you are! Haaah, you got away from me!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But you found me!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Here, Ross, take our picture. Smile! You're on Janice Camera!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Kill me. Kill me now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey everybody! It's Fun Bobby!

utterance.speaker: Fun Bobby
utterance.content: Hey, sorry I'm late. But my, uh, grandfather, he- died about two hours ago. But I-I-I couldn't get a flight out 'til tomorrow, so here I am!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Fun Bobby! Whoah! Who died?

utterance.speaker: Fun Bobby
utterance.content: It's gonna be an open casket, y'know, so at least I'll- I get to see him again.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh, I'm gonna blow this one up, and I'm gonna write 'Reunited' in glitter.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Alright, Janice, that's it! Janice... Janice... Hey, Janice, when I invited you to this party I didn't necessarily think that it meant that we-

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh, no. Oh, no.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm sorry you misunderstood...

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh my God. You listen to me, Chandler, you listen to me. One of these times is just gonna be your last chance with me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, will you give me the thing.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi, Max!

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: Yoko. I've decided to go to Minsk without you.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Wow.

utterance.speaker: Max
utterance.content: It won't be the same- but it'll still be Minsk. Happy New Year.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you alright?

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm fine, I'm fine.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You're going to Minsk.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: No, I'm... not going to Minsk.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, you are so going to Minsk. You belong in Minsk. You can't stay here just 'cause of me.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Yes I can. Because if I go it means I have to break up with you, and I can't break up with you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yes, yes, yes you can. Just say, um, 'Phoebe, my work is my life and that's what I have to do right now'. And I say 'your work?! Your work?! How can you say that?!'. And then you say, um, 'it's tearing me apart, but I have no choice. Can't you understand that?'. And I say 'no! No! I can't understand that!'.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: Uh, ow.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, sorry. Um, and, and then you put your arms around me. And then you put your arms around me. And, um, and then you tell me that you love me and you'll never forget me.

utterance.speaker: David
utterance.content: I'll never forget you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And then you say that it's almost midnight and you have to go because you don't wanna start the new year with me if you can't finish it. I'm gonna miss you. You scientist guy.

utterance.speaker: Dick Clark
utterance.content: Hi, this is Dick Clark, live in Times Square. We're in a virtual snowstorm of confetti here in Times Square...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: There y'go, kids.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And then the peacock bit me. Please kiss me at midnight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You seen Sandy?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ooh. Uh, I don't know how to tell you this, but she's in Monica's bedroom, getting it on with Max, that scientist geek. Ooh, look at that, I did know how to tell you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Vrrbddy, the bll is drrbing.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: The bll is drrbing!

utterance.speaker: Dick Clark
utterance.content: In twenty seconds it'll be midnight...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And the moment of joy is upon us.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Looks like that no date pact thing worked out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Everybody looks so happy. I hate that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Not everybody's happy. Hey Bobby!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, I uh.. just thought I'd throw this out here. I'm no math whiz, but I do believe there are three girls and three guys right here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I dunno. I don't feel like kissing anyone tonight.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can't kiss anyone.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So I'm kissing everyone?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nonono, you can't kiss Ross, that's your brother.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Perfect. Perfect. So now everybody's getting kissed but me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Alright, somebody kiss me. Somebody kiss me, it's midnight! Somebody kiss me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alrightalrightalright. There.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I wanted this to work so much. I mean I'm still in there, changing his diapers, pickin' his fleas... but he's just phoning it in. Just so hard to accept the fact that something you love so much doesn't love you back.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ...I think that bitch cracked my tooth.
